head.title: Car Hits and Runs, Killing Queens Boy

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New York

hedline.hl1: Car Hits and Runs, Killing Queens Boy

block.p: An 8-year-old Queens boy was killed in an apparent hit-and-run accident after his school bus dropped him off in Flushing yesterday.

The police said that the boy, Jafkaran Dhillion, of 147-29 Hawthorne Avenue, was struck by a car about 3 P.M. as he crossed Hawthorne Avenue near 149th Street. He had just stepped off the bus, the police said. The bus apparently had its flashing lights on, meaning other motorists are supposed to stop. The child was pronounced dead at New York Hospital about a half-hour later.
